content: this text is about a legal case in the supreme court of croatia it provides a summary of the progress of the case without mentioning the names of the parties involved the case is about a legal procedure called cost procedure in the first instance the case involves a property registered under number 3052 in the cadastral municipality of d consisting of a house and a yard the plaintiff owns a 12 share of the property while the counterparty also owns a 12 share the property has been sold through a public auction and the proceeds will be divided proportionally based on each coowners share the text mentions specific laws that were used to make a decision in the case but does not provide further details about the parties or the progress of the case
